downloadTitle: Search Topology Operations in SharePoint Server 2010
downloadDescription: This white paper describes how to use the Windows PowerShell™ command-line interface to add components to scale out the search topology in Microsoft® SharePoint® Server 2010.

downloadFile.name: Search Topology Operations in SharePoint Server 2010.xps
Search Topology Operations in SharePoint Server 2010.pdf
Search Topology Operations in SharePoint Server 2010.docx

detailsSection: This white paper describes how to use the Windows PowerShell™ command-line interface to add components to scale out the search topology in Microsoft® SharePoint® Server 2010. It also describes how to perform a full topology import and export.
detailsSection_file_name: Search Topology Operations in SharePoint Server 2010.xps
Search Topology Operations in SharePoint Server 2010.pdf
Search Topology Operations in SharePoint Server 2010.docx
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
